test.instr: (:ins (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X green) (type Y container) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (open X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X microwave))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X television))) (:cons_notnot (:info (opened X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X cupboard)))) )
test.nl: Open the closet. Put a green cup in the microwave. Open the microwave. Go to the television. The cupboard must be opened.
